rules_text:
Flying
Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
At the beginning of each end step, scry X, you gain X life, and Nakia, Infinity Seer deals X damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of noncreature spells you’ve cast this turn.
